item.title: Copenhagen & Self interest equates to Failure
item.author: Brigette Atkins,
item.description: Being carefully turned in the candlelight, crystalline reflections were cast across the scroll strewn desk. Angular yet polished, shining yet black as the unlit night, the previously worthless anthracite was becoming the focus of one of the world’s greatest minds. A pair of well worn hands â€¦
